Description:
Maintenance Technician (handyman)Conducting routine inspections and performing preventive maintenance tasks in the hotel rooms and common areas, on machinery, equipment, and systems to ensure optimal functionality and safety.
Collaborating with maintenance peers to diagnose problems, troubleshoot issues, and carry out timely repairs, minimizing disruptions in operation.
Recording detailed logs of maintenance actions.Skills
Skills:
Written and verbal skills enabling clear interaction with team members and management regarding maintenance updates, reports, and equipment status.
Problem-solving capabilities
Team player
Flexible schedule
Well groomed and mannered
Highly organized
